description:
Responsibilities;
Manage Phone systems, faxes and private billings, sending referrals, returning patient calls and addressing concerns & inquiries, scanning patient information, registering and welcoming patients, communicate general clinic information to clients, receiving, filing & distributing mail, schedule, modify and confirm appointments, record and relay information accurately, liaising with medical laboratories/ physician offices for appropriate patient documentation, stocking medical supplies in exam rooms, maintain cleanliness of clinic, coordinate the flow of patients in the examination and treatment areas, accompany physicians during sensitive examinations as required, perform height and weight measurements as required. Maintain confidentiality at all times.
Please note: The above responsibilities are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed for this position, it is not intended to be an exhaustive list of al responsibilities required for this position.
Experience
Must have 1-2 years experience in a medical clinic
Proficiency in use of of computers and electronic medical record (Oscar Pro solution is an asset)
Excellent interpersonal skills
Excellent communication skills
Expected start date: To be negotiated
Job Types: Part-time, Freelance
Salary: $18.00-$21.00 per hour
Expected hours: No less than 15 per week
Schedule:

 Day shift
 Evening shift
 Monday to Friday
 Weekends as needed

Work Location: In person
